name: Growlanser V: Heritage of War
description: Join Haschen, a young officer of the Peace Maintenance Brigade, as he goes on a dangerous journey to bring peace and restore balance to his homeland in this tactical RPG. See the brewing storm of war from multiple viewpoints and generations, each of them pursuing their own ideas of true peace. Forge relationships and strengthen them in fast-paced strategic battle! Who will be the one to receive your pledge of eternal friendship?
